resources.string:
The Co.Studify as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by the ABCG Team at no cost and is intended for use as is. 
This page is used to inform visitors regarding the policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Services. 
If you choose to use our Services, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. 
The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which are accessible at Co.Studify unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13 years of age. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do the necessary actions.

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. \nThis policy is effective as of 2024–12–20
If you have any questions or suggestions about our app, do not hesitate to contact us at teamabcg06@gmail.com.

You may also follow our devs on their social media account 
 
Sophia Granado - https://www.facebook.com/Thekidwithforgottenmagic 
 
Rochelle Cruz - https://www.facebook.com/rochelle.cruz.9469/ 
 
Anna Marie German - https://www.facebook.com/annamarie.german.33
 
Lhoyd Andrew Bernabe - https://www.facebook.com/aqwe08 
 
Mark Angelo Alcera - https://www.facebook.com/Marknotmark.16101

In 2022, Team ABCG developed this application, called Co.Studify App. This was made to help their fellow students in organizing their schoolwork. This program serves as a reminder for the tasks you need to accomplish and gives guidance on what you need to do. \n \nThe software will allow them to enjoy incredible learning experiences. It boosts students chances of participating in the learning process by allowing them to investigate areas of interest, such as their circumstances.
